column2: "I don't need to explain it, do I? Just kill all the D-arkers you can. I don't really need anything other than that."

"I have no interest in getting to know you or
anything. All that's required is the ability to kill
all those abominations you encounter."

"I believe you at least have that in you, so
hurry up and get on with the request."

"もう説明は必要ないだろう？
ダーカーを殺せるだけ殺してきて。
それ以外は特に求めてないから。"

"馴れ合いも付き合いも必要ない。
必要なのは、あいつらを殺し尽くす
力だけ。"

"あんたはそれがあるんだし
さっさと依頼、やってきてよね。"
